import React from 'react' const HeadingWidget = ({widget, setWidget, editing}) =>
{ !editing &&
{ widget.size ===1 &&

{widget.text}

} { widget.size ===2 &&

{widget.text}

} { widget.size ===3 &&

{widget.text}

} { widget.size ===4 &&

{widget.text}

} { widget.size ===5 &&
{widget.text}
} { widget.size ===6 &&
{widget.text}
}
} { editing &&
setWidget(widget => ({...widget, text: e.target.value}))} value={widget.text} className="form-control"/>
}
export default HeadingWidget
